title: New: Solar Bears – Cosmic Runner
body:
Having announced their return with the fantastic **Keep Shelly In Athens** featuring [_Alpha People_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/13651-new-solar-bears-alpha-people-feat-keep-shelly-in-athens/) earlier in the year, Irish duo **Solar Bears** are back with a new track, also to be taken from their forthcoming sophomore album. _Cosmic Runner_ is an expansive dance influenced number, utterly addictive and completely enthralling, it’s one of those pieces of music that you never really want to end. Check it out below.

Photo credit: Unknown
